title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite - MT21010 Mathematical model formulation with governing equations, boundary conditions; case studies of some important metallurgical system: packed and fluidized bed, moving boundary problems with melting, solidifications and reactions, interaction of gas bubbles and jets with liquid, gas stirred ladle, filling ladle, fusion welding, cored wire injection, soaking pits, continuous casting, leaching reactors etc.. Numerical methods for solving partial differential equations: Control Volume Technique, Finite Element Method etc. Numerical solutions of some cases mentioned above. Text Books:1.S.V. Patankar: Numerical Heat Transfer and Fluid Flow, Hemisphere Publishing Corporation, USA, 1980.2.R.I.L Guthrie: Engineering in Process Metallurgy, Oxford Science Publications, 1989.
